42022006	Yutasva unna , lehra , wo hev nengna , henanam si kava Yesusmba hena englarava holvonethinvav ? Kava indkumbina novra vinvavmoa .
42022007	Doa Yutanind una , ata pivva deti hlavav hona mendekli innemba , pivnamba Pasova tih innemba . Hona inneram sipsip otolva walka vena , Sesoam nonam sembayang venalm . Rotiva yishui hlavna .
42022008	Doa Yesus hevna aonghal mahalnindrini samblam Pitai Yonim unna , yeoa engo mi yesna , Pasova innem pivm meilna velm . Ata kava sis ambvav , ata os pimba mongawulm hlavav . Hev ohomnana , ata hi kava kokolma evevav ?
42022009	
42022010	Hev unna , kotaram esihohoo , wo ata yimba di enonglavav , tendoriniva po wulprovra emberna . Wo no indhanarinim yeoa ehengpethamno dom deuvram . Wo no deuvna aralmoa os ohomno , pivna guruva os oi , hi nomba kamarva lohv , ata diva kava Pasova innemba wonnevavpa ?
42022011	
42022012	Wo deuvna aralva yemba ata indthueinvav yitnihilmba mendeklimba , doa doara kokolma velohv , di yeoa inneoa kokolma evevm .
42022013	Doa Pitai Yoniva enganamba , kamarm enongla , os ten hev Yesus doara naengho vewol ovonam . Doa os meilna evena .
42022014	Nonamba Pasovatihva phonamba , Yesusva wonavhoana hevtindim , unna , kava yemba wonnelmangas vev , doa sism ata kamba indkokla vrivav . Pasovatihna innemba si kava hengava nevavmoa , verava , Sesoatindi nemel si muserava avrava . Nonam si kava nevav Pasovanonoa tihna innemba .
42022015	
42022016	
42022017	Yesus wain kapnahonam vranamba , Sesoam omnana , yimba lehra Sesoa . Hevtindim unna , yeoa honaoa kap wainoa vreirava , hlao . Kava nevavmoa hona wainmba , verava , Sesoatindi nemelva muserava avrava , os si kava nevav .
42022018	
42022019	Doa Yesusva henga roti vranamba , omnana , Sesoa yimba lehra , doa hev popowol venamba , hevtindim moang vungu ovunvna , unna , memba kana nihil , yem kava dembhinv , yem kolvrowolalm . Henga yeoa kamoa nengvhueimnivrava , os hlavm .
42022020	Doa hlapianamba , Yesus wain kapnahonam vranamba , osangas vena , unna , memba kana tovol , kava ata sovhopieinvav , yem kolvrowolalm . Honindava Sesoava yemba moamba nemel ishunv .
42022021	Heva os mongova indhanariniva memba pivva waihlavpa , himba ata kamba ungundna englarava holvonethinvav .
42022022	Kava arana ombol lohv , kava wohengvav , nom ara ten kam omnanam . Heva os kava wavra vrev no indhanarinimba , temba kamba holvonethinvpa ungundmba . Sesoa si hemba kin plothomnavav .
42022023	Doa hevtindi hevm ishuwul vevna , an osva vei ?
42022024	Yesustindiva hevm eishovna , an piriniva kuwulva wulluhunv ? Wo Yesus unna , puehalnindna kuwulva mendekli lovahinv , hev ningv , heoa kana nengavnangmangas engivm , wo heoa kamoa nungeilvra , os himba mendeklinonoa . Heva os yimba kana aonghal mahalnindva , manam yimba sna wevsamba engivav , owai . Himba nomba yeriniva kuwulalmba lohvrava , heoa hevmoa wohwulpihara , maim ora , otollini . Himba nomba yeriniva miva galmba vevrava , heoa yena nengavnangmangas eva enginvrata .
42022025	
42022026	
42022027	Yesus olhmona unna , es yimba ningv , an kuwulva lohv ? Duang , ora hevna innesowanindrini ? Duangta ten kursira avm . Heva os kava snamba owai , kava yena andranindrini luhunv .
42022028	Indhanamba kamba moakoklanamba osihivnamba , yimba kamba waiaevulvna , kamba dasvholaha anganamoa . Kavna ara kamba doara pusvundthoana mendekli kuwulalm , wo doa kava men daipota yem pusvund vev , yimba kana nemeltindi avav , wo pimba si innemba pomba mongawulm hlavav , wo yimba si kuwulva ilvahinvav 12pelara Israeltindina .
42022029	
42022030	
42022031	Yesus ona , Simon hello , Setanmba os oi , kava wiki vewolalm vev Yesustindim . Heva os doa kava Sesoamba osahmani osmba , Pitava kanaminiva wohgavavmoa . Setanmba ata yemba wiki vrepiarava , wo yimba hengava kamba keknamba lohvhoamnavrava , doa yeoa pevna mongawatindina undmoa keknamangas woseinu .
42022032	
42022033	Pitava Yesusm omnana , mendekli , kava pemba vevmoa , yemba engpralmba buiramba eva dahalmba .
42022034	Yesus ona , ata mendah ayamba ophovramoa , ata yimba samblamongolm osva owovav , kava tit venav Yesusmba .
42022035	Yesus unna , nemetva kava yemba wolanga vungu vevna kavna andramba , yemba kava os unna , manam pevna diwonda , luwunda , spato ianga vevra . Wo nonamba yimba manam asahvna ? Hev umnina , owai , kava mana vemamba asahnamoa .
42022036	Hev unna , daipotava yimba kana andrava vivrava , yimba himba nomba diwondava iaevulvrava , yeoa pevna diwonda luwunda ianga vevm . Eva yimba ovlakashuiva , yeoa pevna bayu sovanam mongnindm dembrahunu , dim dombolm nonam . Wo no dina yimba sism sovavav ovlakasva pevmba .
42022037	Yesusva osva olhmona unna ovlakasm , wo henga unna , noinda viu , moamba doaramini novol velohv os , Indhanamba nunglivra no indhanarinimba , himba uvra , indhanarinikokla . Indhanamba sna nengavnangva si kamba vinivra . Manara , doaraminimomba novol velohv , wo indhanamba kamba osangas velvohmanav , os ten novol velohvm .
42022038	Hev umnina , mendekli , nonglo , ovlakas sambla men . Hev unna , doa .
42022039	Os wongana nominiva oliv denwit oloram , dom ten hev elsus tonglalohvnam , sembayang velm . Di wonphonamba , hev unna , yeoa Sesoamoa osihminu , yena undmoa keknam woseinda , ata homeis Setan yem wiki vewol vevm .
42022040	
42022041	Himba hevho nominiva venamba indanampetam , mulumbdandna lohvhoana , Sesoam aralm osahmanavna . Ona , ara , kana kinwondaoa yeoa nengas pipaho , ambo yepevna undna yimba osva nengtava .
42022042	
42022043	Doa mongo Sesoana ovsongolnindrini pihanamba senamini , hena undm keknam lothomnana .
42022044	Heva os Yesusmba kin venavna mindnam , wo noinda himba keknamangas Sesoam osahmanavna , ehlava pihangu venavna pethara , os ovna , tovol toparal vev . Doa himba ishopianamba , henga hevtindi inam dem geine , nongalna , nin shav . Kinsomb vinvnamba , noinda shavna .
42022045	
42022046	Doa hev unna , manam yimba shavav , pulvorava , Sesoam osihminu , homeis Setan yem wiki vewol vevm .
42022047	Yesusva mendah ishunvna , wo henanam hevtindirini mongo Yutas , himba nom sembayangnindna kuwulmendeklim , polisim , mundilm wonprovna . Yutasva murapetam Yesusindam ganamba , englana selthoanamba , mapotho ovrungu vevna .
42022048	Doa heva os Yesusva omnana , yimba kamba mapotho ovravma novtotholm , wo eva yimba kamba ungundm indthueinvma ?
42022049	Yesusna aonghal mahalnindva hemba nungeilvnamba , ata kevrivav Yesusmba , doa hev Yesusm umnina , ata kava hemba helvowol vivav ovlana .
42022050	Mongo no hevtindirini Yesusna , ovla mendekli wulluhvna , doa hev no mongo indhanarinina aong kovhoamna nihanasisrini . Nomba indhanariniva sembayang andranindna mendekli kuwulna andranindrini .
42022051	Yesus hevtindim unna , aembu , doa Yesusva os no indhanarinina aongva tuhmanana , henga beswonam lohmanana .
42022052	Yesus unna nom indhanam , ten Yutas wonproim , yimba kamba os ningminivma daosnindrini , wo noinda yimba iambvna tengava ovlava ?
42022053	Kava elsus tempelduvra ishomana vevna , yimba kamba nangola vrivna , heva os yimba kamba diva kevrivnamoa . Men detiva yenamba luhunv , Setanmba hevna mendekliandra vev , yemba wohtalmba kamba kevrilmba .
42022054	Doa no indhanamba Yesusmba kevrinamba , os waiwohangana sembayang mendekli kuwulna deuvram . Doa Pitava sisnonoa ambo oiwonam engalgavna .
42022055	Indhanamba suwemba di sengewuvna no kuwulinda deuvpethalla , hevpa di suwera kuksa vevna , wo Pitava pronamba sis , di patha avhueinvna murapeta suwera .
42022056	Mongo ongamalongorini pra , kuwulna andranindrini . Himba suwemdakambara Pitam nonglanamba , olhanam . Hev mindkombaiwonam unna , honi indhanariniva himba Yesustindirini .
42022057	Doa Pita omnana , owai , kava tit venav Yesusmba . Ona henanam , wo henga mongo tendorini nonglanamba Pitam , hev omnana , yimba Yesusi lohmana evevna . Doa Pitava omnana , kava owai .
42022058	
42022059	Wo venamba , mongo tendorini woholhana indnahonam , hona indhanariniva himba Galili provinsrini , os men Yesus hev , himba Yesustindirinita .
42022060	Doa Pita omnana , owai , kava tit vev , nomba yimba temba ovpa . Nonamba Pitava ishovna , ayamba os ophona . Yesus mendekliva haravhoanamba , Pitam nonglanga ve novnangas , wo Pitava no moam Yesusnam doaraminim nengna , ona , ata ayamba mendah ophovramoa , yimba ata samblamongolm osva owol vevav , kava tit venav Yesusmba .
42022061	
42022062	Pitava no deuvriniva wohpholahangana , wenoppa mindnam dalmanavna .
42022063	Kuwulva mendah di Yesusmba waiolvohvnamba , wo polisiva Yesusm loumona umnivna , wevdakana hilvivna , novm hehlathawulminina lensona , umnina , yimba moashulnindriniva lohtava , kam ishunu , anmund yemba hilvi ? Wo mindnam loumona ishumnivna .
42022064	
42022065	
42022066	Lingil lihanamba , noi kuwul kusovna , hevm ishuvna . Sembayang andranindna kuwulmendekli , katekis noi kusonamba , hev polisim unna , hom Yesusm waiembo , ka hui waiishui .
42022067	Hev umnina , yimba Kristus lohvma , temba Sesoava pusvundthoanam ? , kam ishunu . Hev unna , yemba kava ishuntava , ata yimba ningvavmoa . Wo eva yemba kava sah owol vetava , ata yimba kamba opla vrimnivavmoa . Doa heva os si kava avhoavav Sesoana nihanasis yunalm , ten keknamangas avm , manara , kava arana ombol lohv .
42022068	
42022069	
42022070	Doa hev indkumbi umnina , yimba os nengvma , yimba Sesoana ombol ? Doa hev opla vrinna , yimba os uvta , ka .
42022071	Doa hev hevm una , doa pivva hilli Yesusna moamba . Noinda pimba ata indhanarinimba mongova osihminivavmoa wetatmomba Yesusnamba .
42023001	Nomba kuwulva hevm ishupieinamba , os waiangana Yesusm Pailat duangindam . Doa hev moangakala ovrivna Yesusm . Os kava hillina , hona indhanariniva indhanamba monakoklaram desimbuingavna osm , manam yimba vinivav taeksdiva Sisa duangmba . Wo eva himba hevmba os ovna , kangas Kristusva lohv , temba doarava Sesoava kuwulalmba pusvundthoanamba .
42023002	
42023003	Doa Pailat omnana Yesusm , yimba kuwul wulluhunvma Yutanindna ? Yesus ona , yimba temba oiva , tanamta .
42023004	Doa Pailat unna kuwulm nom eva ombandhanam , kava os nonglav , hona indhanariniva indkoklava venamoa . Doa heva os no kuwul opulvona , owai , himba desimbuingavna indhanamba . Himba lohmana vevna kana Yutia provinsra , eva numhowol vevna indhanam . Himba seilva Galili provinsra numhowol vevna , wo sism homba prona .
42023005	
42023006	Pailatva hellenamba , hev unna , hona indhanariniva dihi Galili provinsrini lohv ?
42023007	Hev umnina Pailatm , tanam himba Herot kuwulna anglasingi lohv . Doa henga Pailat unna , yeoa waiango Herotindam , eva men himba avta Yerusalemra .
42023008	Doa hev waianganamba Herotindam , himba Yesusm nonglavnamba , indk vethavna , no tahonnam no weisnam kava nonglavnamoa Yesusmba . Wo kava os nengv , heoa boasna mana vema mendekliandra vera kana novra .
42023009	Doa Herotva Yesusm mindnam sah ovravna , heva os Yesusva hemba opla vremnavnamoa .
42023010	Doa no kuwulva di lovahvna , himba Herotm moangakalamona tuho ovrivna mindnam , osm Yesusm musk venavra .
42023011	Doa Herot , hevna valgonind himba Yesusm loumona indkokla ovrivna . Herot unna hevna valgonindm , pikian vewol vinu kuwulna , osm dasalm uvra , ora kuwulmendekli , wo henga nonahonam waiango Pailatindam .
42023012	Wo nonamba Heroti Pailativa epawohana beswonam , seilva himba ahnam elohwolvna .
42023013	Herot Yesusm henga wolaihangana Pailatindam , wo Pailatva huhul vena no kuwulm eva indhanam .
42023014	Hev unna , hona indhanarinimba , memba yimba waiembeiva kaindava , kamba os umni , himba indhanamba desimbuingavna monakoklara . Wo yena novra kava sah ovraloh veiva , oi , owai , himba indkoklava venamoa , memba yimba osihivpa hemba .
42023015	Wo eva Herotva osta , himba henga kaindam wolaihaprini hemba . Tanam Yesusva indkoklava venamoa , osm ora kava wohtvav helvakomandhalmba .
42023016	Wo osva ambo kava wohtvav helvelm , wo henga wolaihanga .
42023017	Himba noinda osva ona , hena wevsava os lohvna , himba buinindrinim mongasalm wolapho veluhunvna Pasovatihramba no tahonnam no tahonnam os .
42023018	Doa heva os no indkumbi hev ambo opelpana aongtanahonam , owai , helvakomandho hona indhanarinimoa . Barapasmoa yeoa kamoa wolaihaphunu buimerinioa .
42023019	Barapasva daosm vevna duangm , wo noinda himba hevm ahalvamana vena Yerusalemra , indhanamba monglamba dalna , wo Barapasmba noinda bui vina .
42023020	Doa heva os Pailat henga unna , owai , kava Yesusm wolaihapholm vev buiriniva . Doa heva os himba vevandwonam mindnam umnina , owai , krusera lepetheiu .
42023021	
42023022	Doa henga Pailat eunillam unna , owai , mana vemava venamoa , osm noinda kava wohtvav , helvakomandhalmba . Wo osva ambo kava wohtvav helvelm , wo henga wolaihanga .
42023023	Heva os himba wuleihivnamoa , himba nihnapehna umnivna mindnam Pailatm , hemoa lepetheiu krusera . Venamba , os wohpilpikovvna Pailatmba .
42023024	Doa Pailat unna , ata kava os venavav , ye ten uvm . Hev unna valgonindm , Barapasmoa wuleihu , daosnindrinimoa , doa Yesusmoa waiango , lepethalm .
42023025	
42023026	Os waiangana kruserava , lepethalmba , monara anongla vena mongo indhanarinim nihilva Simon . Himba Sairini kotanindrini lohvna , himba osorini venamba , kotaram provna . Doa valgonind umnina , Yesusna kruse pungao .
42023027	Mi Yesusm wailovahvnamba , indkumbiva sis pelkleihamnavna , monglava ungevliva wenahil vrivna , monglava ambo wenop pulupul vivna .
42023028	Yesusva sisnov venamba , unna , yimba Yerusalem ongo , manam yimba kamba wuov , pevm wuowol veo , pevna otomotalm . Si sewonam sikoklava phunvav yeindava , wo yimba uvav , ungevliva muhsohva indk vithivra . Manam eva himba ningvav otolm lupulilmba .
42023029	
42023030	Sikokla ambo phovav , wo indhanamba uvra , holooa olora tivhoarava , pimoa sising vera , pimba nunglivavmoa .
42023031	Indhanamba men hui kin kamba plothumniv , maim oi , ti pehnana suwera tithueiv . Doa heva os sikoklava phovrava yeindava , maim ora , teh ovovral suwera tithueiv , wavro .
42023032	Yesusm eva indhanakoklarini samblam os wonangana mongawulm . Wonanganamba , di wonpulvo , os ningthivna indhanana kukel nomba pethava . Doa di lopa vina kruserava , Yesusm eva nom indhanarini samblam . Mongova nihanasis , mongova sihanasis , Yesusmba hevmba hovra .
42023033	
42023034	Doa Yesus Sesoam omnana , ara , yeoa maivethinu honaoa indhananaoa indkoklamoa , manara , himba honamba tit viv , memba kamba vinivpa . Doa valgonindva pilai win vivna , osm ora henoi ata moan vravav Yesusna pikianmba .
42023035	Indhanamba di nunglul lovah vungo vevna Yesusm . Doa kuwulva dasalm una , himba indhanamba kolvrowol vevna monakoklariniva , wo eva osta hevmoa kolvrara henga . Himba tanamba Kristusva lohtava , heoa hevmoa kolvrara .
42023036	Doa valgonindva mueri losgoplala ovrivna hemba , hev murapeta lovahthanamba , hev umnina , yimba hona wainmba nevavma ? Yimba kuwulnonoa Yutanindnamba luhuntava , yeoa pevm kolvro .
42023037	
42023038	Moamba kruserava senamba os novol velohvna ,
42023039	Yesus eva no indhanarini sambla wekal velohvna kruserava , doa mongo no indhanarini loumona ophona , Yesus , yimba Kristus lohvma ? Yeoa pevmoa wolaihapiho kruserinioa , eva kamoa wolapiha veota os .
42023040	Doa mongo noi owalm okos vene , ata ye os ovav ? Pimba doa wekal vini , os men Yesus , pimba doa indkokla evena , wo noinda pimba esesm honamba vini . Heva os hona indhanariniva Yesusva himba mana vemamba venamoa , ambo ombamora hemba vini . Pioa Sesoanapenamoa evei .
42023041	
42023042	Doa hev omnana Yesusm , yimba sewonamba provrava , mendekli kuwulalm avrava , manam yimba kamba maivethavav , kamoa nengmanavm kolvralm . Doa Yesus omnana , sewonamba owai , detingas ata kava yemba waiavhoavav vuhe besallangas .
42023043	
42023044	Okombava hovrahovra lohvnamba , Yesusva krusera wendvna , doa okombava ambo heva hev wohkilvrana simsna . Os wohkilvralohna , venamba , 3klok okomba vohanam . Wo no kayenmba tempelduvmeriniva ambo heva hev hovrahovra wohpowalwolna , dipeh venamba , dingoho mulla .
42023045	
42023046	Yesus ona mindnam , ara , kavna indva kava yena englisra holothov . Os onamba , doa os wohvitivhoana .
42023047	Yesusmba os dahana , wo valgonindna kuwulva nonglanamba , hev ona , tanamta hona indhanariniva mani indhanakoklarinima , owai , himba besal indhanarini , Sesoam kava okolav .
42023048	No indhanamba temba Yesusmba nunglul lovahvnamba , hev nunglina , doa dahai , doa henga pethasav wulowanamba , wena akilthangavna deuvram .
42023049	Heva os Yesusna sehel , himba ehallapeta mendah ambo nongalemb velvohvna . Wo eva ungevli Galiliongo , temba hemba doara engvawulimbanamba Galili provinsrini Yerusalemram , himba eva mendah nongalemb velvohvna .
42023050	Mongo indhanarini lohvna , nihilva Yosep , himba Arimatia kembellini . Himba mongo kuwul wulluhunvna Yutanindna , himba besal lohvna , besal wevsam engvna . No kuwul owalva Yesusmba helvakomandhalmba uvnamba , himba owai nengvnamoa , himba hevmba vreipra vrevna noindava . Himba hona nengavnang wulluhvna , Sesoatindiva nemelva si muserava avav .
42023051	
42023052	Yoseppa ganamba Pailat duangindam , hev omnana , ata kava Yesusmindm kruserini vindilpihavav , singvelm . Wo Pailat omnana , wouta . Doa Yoseppa vindilpihanamba , kayen dombal mendeklina ninge . Doa os vindyithana honmera , doara indhana no honmeva hina , heva os indhanarinimba mongomba singvinamoa , mendah khui lohvna .
42023053	
42023054	Himba honamba yumatram vena , nonam Yutanind inne meilna vivna sapturam hlalm , osva sapturava vah iaevulvav .
42023055	No Galiliongova , temba Yesusmba doarava sisva engvawulimbanamba , himba Yosepm sis patvmonanamba , nunglul lovahvna honmem eva Yosepm , ora os vindyithav Yesusmindmba .
42023056	Doa no ungevliva henga deuvram anga , mana vema besal teteihnungnam kokolma velm wel , sanda . Himba iangalm vevna , Yesusmindm nonam selvolm . Heva os owai , doa okombava vohavna , ungevliva vah iaevluwul vevna nonamba , una , pioa doaraminimom wohengalvohra .
42024001	Doa minguram simekumbranonoa no ungevliva hevna deuvrini vinamba , Yesusm nonglalm angavna pokamaram . Himba wel sanda noi iangavna , om ten hev doara meilna vinam .
42024002	Doa himba pokamam nunglul lovahvna , pai , honmba ahnam vileilv , nomba nivpa temba ehlithinamba pokamamba .
42024003	Doa hev saivnamba no honmera , wo heva os Yesusmindva vindilvnamoa diva .
42024004	Himba hevm ishuvna mindnam , hi dihi vindilv ? Doa mongo noi indhanarini sambla no ungevlim wonelohvna , hena kayenmba mindnam ambo painov kesaka viku vinvna .
42024005	Doa no ungevliva pem viwul vevna , ambo himba pethanovangas vivna , hemba nungeilvnamoa . Doa no indhanarini sambla ohunna , yimba aslalvma Yesusmindm ? Owai , indhanamindhovrava manam yimba aslalvav , himba doa beswonam phoi hevna nihna . Ningu no moam , yem ten hev ishunnam , nonam hev avnam Galili provinsra .
42024006	
42024007	Himba os ona , kava arana ombol lohv , heva os kamba si ungundna englisra bumbrisvav , wo si os kamba kruserava lepetheivav . Wo kava si samblamongonin vevav , wo si os kava phovav henga kavna nihna .
42024008	Doa no ungevliva ningna Yesusna moam , os wuleihalaha angana no pokamava , ishunilm Yesusna moalamangnindm 11pelaram eva aonghal mahalnindm indkumbim .
42024009	
42024010	No ungevliva mongova Maria Maktala , mongova Yoana , mongova Maria Yemsna aval . Hona ungevli eva mongla ungevli , Yesusna pholmomba he wulanginna moalamangnindmba .
42024011	Heva os no moalamangnindva no moamba hillinamba , una , yimba dai uv , kava ningvmoa , osva oi , lehra uv .
42024012	Doa Pitava lelnam ganamba , doa hev vithanamba , nov vesiha ve pokamara , nonglana , kayenangas moan vilv , noi ten Yesusmindm nona ningithinam , mongova mana vemamba owai . Doa henga os deuvram gana , himba mindnam nengavnang vevna os i .
42024013	Nonamangas Yesusna aonghal mahalnindrini samblava Yerusalemrini evenamba , Emeus kembellam engavna , mani oklama . Nonamba himba engavnamba , himba Yesusna dahalmom ihishuwul engavna hevm monam .
42024014	
42024015	Himba mindnam ihishovna , doa Yesus hev yumna vewolnamba , os wongavna no monam . Enonglavna , heva os novmba mana vema ehlathinvna , himba beswonamba elihavnamoa .
42024016	
42024017	Yesus unna , manamom hevpa yimba mindnamba eukw evevrav momnanamba ? Doa hev elohvhoanamba , novlomosnahonam duus evevhowole .
42024018	Mongova nomba heriniva nihilva Kliopas , hev omnana Yesusm , es eva yimba tit vevma , memba honamba mana vemamba mendekliva phonamba Yerusalem kotarava hona mingu eunumbulnamba ? Dihi yimba mongona kotanindrini , noinda yimba tit ovov ?
42024019	Yesus unna , manamoa ? Hev ohomnana , Yesusmom nom Nasaret kembellinim . Himba moashulnindrini lohvna Sesoana , mendekliandra vewol vevna . Himba Sesoana moam indhanamba ishomana vinvna , wo Sesoava eva indhanamba hemba liheivna , Yesusva keknamangas lohv .
42024020	Heva os pina sembayang andranindna kuwul , mundil , himba Pailat duangna englisra desvhueina hemba , kruseram lepethalm . Wo nemetva kava os ningvna , hona indhanarinim Sesoava wolaihaprana , ona pimba Israelnindmba buirinim wolapho velm . Heva os owai , doa dahana , doa hemba lepetheinamba , wo samblamongonin hemba vindilna pokamarava .
42024021	
42024022	Heva os doa ungevliva kanamba monglava kamba ishuni , wo kava luklukul vithi . Manara , himba daipota simekumbra angai , nonglalmba Yesusmindmba , doa heva os owai , vindilvnamoa . Himba henga ambaiva , kam ishuni os , kava doa Sesoana ovsongolnindrini samblamba nungeili , wo himba kamba ihishuni os , Yesusva doa henga beswonam phoi .
42024023	
42024024	Wo monglava kariniva Yesusna pokamaram angai nonglalm , wo os nungli himba , ten ungevli ishunim , heva os Yesusmba himba nunglimoa .
42024025	Doa Yesusva no moam hellenamba , unna nom sambla indhanam , yimba ind hui elohvma ? Doaraminimomba moashulnindnamba yimba ekek vethawol evinvnamoa .
42024026	Os novol velohv , kin mendekli si vevav , nonamba Kristusmba kevrivrava . Wo boasna himba si hona kinmba pungavav , wo os si hev vuhe besallava Sesoaiva wohahavav .
42024027	Doa Yesusva mendah ishunvna no sambla indhanam , moam nom velokusa vinvna , ten doara moashulnind novol vinam , Moses eva owal moashulnind . Hev unna , hona moamba Kristusm wohlehv .
42024028	Mendah momnanam ishulangavna , murapeta doa pulvovna Emeus kembella . Yesusva os vevna , ona , wohkohangalm vev , hev ohomnana , owai , okombava doa vohav , yem ka hui waiahai . Doa os waiahana , mendah hemba elihavnamoa .
42024029	
42024030	Doa innem aevulthanamba , hlalm vevna , Yesus roti vranamba , Sesoam omnana , lehra , doa powalwolnamba , moang vethawolinna . Doa hena novpa pevhoawolinna , elihana , Yesus hev memba . Wo nungi lelnam Yesusva hoai vena nominiva os .
42024031	
42024032	Himba hevm ihishovna , pina indva suwemsna tawulinvna , nonamba pimba monarava doaraminimomba doa wohvelokusethini Yesusva .
42024033	Wo himba indwonamba anahanamoa , indslaposla os wohengana Yerusalemram henga , hevna owalm 11pelaram , eva indhana monglam nongalephona .
42024034	Doa heva os noi 11pelara di aevulvnam , hesna nungi ishunna no sambla indhanam , ona , doa mendekliva henga beswonam phoi . Himba proiva , Simonm nonglapho . Wo eva osta , no sambla indhanamba Emeusriniva os ihishunnata , kava monara enonglai , eva di roti powalwolim , di kav vei elihai .
42024035	
42024036	Mendah ishuvna Yesustindiva , wo henanam nungi Yesus hovrahovra lohvhueinna , unna , indwonam aevulu , Sesoa yemba wonav . Heva os no indhanamba himba evekingil vithina penahonam , uvna , sumbho .
42024037	
42024038	Yesus unna , owai , manara yimba pemba viv . Es hevpa yimba osva uv , sumbho , hui nunglu kana englana monglanam . Memba ka , kam kevru , nunglu , sumbhova sna nihnamba , owai .
42024039	
42024040	Doa osva onamba , hevna englamongla nihinna . Doa himba wohindk vithivna ,
42024041	heva os himba monglava mendah sambla und verumbvna , tanammi owaimi . Noinda hev unna , inne kam vreuhtuk ,
42024042	doa tambkoshind vetreihuna ,
42024043	doa hev os ninna hevna novra .
42024044	Hev unna , nemetva doarava kava yemba wonavnamba , kava yemba os ishunna , moamba nomba Mosesna eva moashulnindna eva Devitna sangalmoa novol velohv , no moamba kam lehvrav , wo kava yunam wohengvav no moam .
42024045	Wo doa Yesusva hena nengavnangmba otuhowol ovinna , wo noinda no Sesoamomba doaraminimomba himba beswonamba levrapivolna .
42024046	Hev unna , moamba os novol velohv , si Kristusmba kin vreiuhvav , os hemba dahavav . Heva os samblamongonin himba verava pokamarava , hengava himba si os beswonam phovav hevna nihna .
42024047	Yimba kamba naengho vruwuvmona vevnam , wo yeoa kana moamoa wulvaho indakonda pethara , vei hui Yerusalem kotara , verava , puehalnindna pethara . Os ishunvm , indkoklamoa wuleihivra , wo Sesoa yena indkoklamba osva si maikumi vinvra .
42024048	
42024049	Kava yemba mana vema besal vraholm vinv , ara doara nemet ten wohonam . Yeoa hui kotara aevvm , wo si Sesoava wolaihaprinvav no mana vemamba yemba , yemba poauothowol verava , yena kelva keknam woseinvav .
42024050	Doa Yesusva ishopieinnamba hevna aonghal mahalnindmba , os wongana dom murapetam Betani kembellamba , wo hev engla liowolnamba , unna , Sesoa yemba awothowol vev .
42024051	Wo honamba mendah vevna , os sandhalaha vongana Sesoaindamba .
42024052	Hevtindiva sembayang vinivna , os indk vethapravna mindnam , wo os Yerusalem kotaramba ambna henga .
42024053	Wo elsus himba tempelduvra Sesoam okololvohvna . Doata Lukna Yesusmomba .
43001001	Nemetva doarava manimani pethava nomba mendah lohvnamoa . Wo Sesoana moamba os nilhana , ona indhanarini . Wo no indhanariniva himba Sesoai lohohra ahavna .
43001002	Himba doara di ahavna Sesoai , nonamba manimani lohvnamoa .
43001003	Manimani henana sovena . Mana vemava indamonamba phonamoa .
43001004	Himba undna avna , wo noinda himba undnonoa daswolna indhanamba indkumbimba , snal ovna , woklava lavradaswolv . Nengam osm beswonam novvie .
43001005	Wo nomba woklava lavrapisahav sikulmonam . Wo simba owai , es eva hemba pilpikohavav .
43001006	Doa Sesoa mongom indhanarinim wolaihaprana , nihilva Yon .
43001007	Himba prunna , ishunilm indhanam woklamom . Wo henamini indkumbiva woklamomba vravra , eva keknam undnahonam lovahthamnalm Kristusm .
43001008	Yonmba himba nomba woklava owai , heva os himba ambo ishunilm prunna indhanam woklamom .
43001009	Hona woklava himba woklanonoa , wo himba honamba petharamba pronamba , indkumbim lovhueinna .
43001010	Himba hona pethara avna , noi ten hev tevenam , wo heva os pethanindva os hemba liheinamoa .
43001011	Himba hevna petharam prona henga , wo heva os hevtindiva hemba patvmonanamoa , Yutanindva .
43001012	Wo heva os monglava hemba patvmonana . Himba keknam undnahonam lovahthamnavna hemba . Wo noinda hemba himba wolawona , alm Sesoana otovotalalm .
43001013	Himba nomba suvenamoa nisva araravalna tovolnamba Sesoana otovotalalmba . Nihna nengavnangrava , indhanana nengavnangrava owai . Sesoa hev suvena hevna otovotalalm .
43001014	Honamba Sesoana moamba nilhana indhanarinielm , wo kamongo himba mongawulm aevulvna . Kava nunglimnivna hena pusambava , osm himba mongasal ombolva Sesoana arana . Hemba wolaihaprana petharam , wo hemba pilivhoawol lohwolv , vei , wavrana eva moanonoana .
43001015	Doa Yon Baptaisva hemom ishona . Hev vevandnam moakus unnam , hehonam kava yemba doarava ishunna , osva mongova indhanariniva sisva si kamba pethapramnavav . Himba mendekli , henga kamba wohkuvhoav . Himba doara wohavna , kava sismini .
43001016	Hemba nongapala vev wavrana eva moanonoana . Henaminiangas pimba indkumbiva elsus vrav esvemava awothowolva .
43001017	Sesoava doa holothunna lohohmomba pimba Mosesna englisra , heva os wavrana moanonoana provna Yesus Kristusnamini .
43001018	Indhanariniva doava mongova nonglanamoa Sesoamba . Heva os Sesoana mongal ombol murava av aralindava . Wo ombol novpa wohwuleihinv pimba , osmba Sesoava snal av .
43001019	Wo doa Yutanindna kuwulva Yerusalemriniva wolamb vevna sembayang andranindm eva kokoldombnindm Yoninam , hem sah ovralm , osm , yimba manalm lohv ?
43001020	Yonmba wohishovna bambanam , himba komandhanamoa , hemba opla vrinilmba . Hev unna bambanam , kava Kristusva owai .
43001021	Wo hev umnina , wo an hevpa eva yimba ? Es hevpa yimba Elaitama , a ? Hev unna , owai , kava Elaitava owai . Wo henga umnina , wo es hevpa yimba no moashulnindrinima , noi ten piv nengvilivm ? Hev unna , owai , kava nomba moashulnindriniva owai .
43001022	Wo hev umnina , wo yimba manalm lohv ? Eva kam ishunuta , osm ata kava os ishunvav , nomba temba himba kamba wolamb veiva . Es yimba oi pevmba ?
43001023	Yon ondoht vinvna Aisaia moashulnindrinina moam , Kana moalamangva os oi , indhanarini wunuho ov sahalpethara , os vueinghimnu monam beswonam mendeklim .
43001024	No Yutanindva , temba hemba wolamb venamba , monglava himba Varisinind .
43001025	Wo hev umnina Yonm , yimba os oima , kava owai Kristusva . Yimba os oima , owai kava Elaitava moashulnindriniva . Yimba os oima , owai kava nomba moashulnindriniva , ten piv nengvilivm ? Wo manara eva yimba ponamba poswol vev indhanamba ?
43001026	Yon ophona , kava poswol vev indhanamba pona . Wo heva os mongo men yemongo lohvm , heva os owai , yimba liheivmoa hemba .
43001027	Himba noi , ten sis pethapramnavm kam . Kava mani mendekli indhanarinima , osva kava pelvwol venavra hena wemba spatoriniva .
43001028	Honamba manimani Yonmba di wonovowona Betani kembella , mongnamilm Yotan pora . Di ten Yon poswol vawovnam pona indhanam .
43001029	Wo mongnasimba Yonmba nonglanga vena , Yesusva ten prov kaindam . Hev unna , nunglu , sipsip otol Sesoana , he pethanindmba kilumbshuawol vev indkoklariniva .
43001030	Hem honamta , kava hemomba ishovna . Kava os ishovna , indhanariniva si sis kamba pethapramnavav , hevna andram velm . Heva os himba mendeklinonoa , kamba kuvhoav , manara , himba doara hesna avna , kava os lohna .
43001031	Seilva kava hemba lihanamoa , wo os kava pronamba , indkumbim pona poswol vevna , osm pimba Israelnindva si liheivav hemba .
43001032	Yonmba unna , kava lihavnamoa , osva an hevpa Kristusva . Heva os Sesoa kamba wolaihaprana , poswolalm ponam . Wo Sesoava kamba ishomnana , yimba si nonglavav , kavsongolva holaperava , ovhoamnavra indhanarini-inda . Wo hona indhanariniva Kristus , he si awothowol vevra Sesoasongolnanamba . Doa Yon henga ona , kava nonglana , Sesoasongolva holapevna senamini . Wo nomba Sesoasongolva snal ona , leumb , wo avna nihra Yesusinda .
43001033	
43001034	Kava nonglana , honamba os vena . Wo kava osoa indhanamba ishunv , memba himba honamba ombolnonoa Sesoana .
43001035	Wo mongnasiva Yon Baptaisva henga di wonlohvna hevna hellelnindrini samblam .
43001036	Himba wonnonglanga vena , ten Yesusva kohangav , wo unna , nunglu sipsip otolm Sesoanam .
43001037	Wo himba ehellena , ona , Yonmba os ov . Wo himba ehengva wulengavna Yesusmba .
43001038	Wo Yesusva ona haravhoana , nongalna , men kam epawohamnav sis . Wo hev unna , manam yimba eslelv ? Hev ohophona , rapai , hi henalhra yimba alohv ? ( Rapaiva osm uv , guru . )
43001039	Yesus opla vrinna , kam ambo ehengpro , ata yimba di enonglavav . Wo doa no indhanarini samblava os wohepawohamnana Yesusmba . Wo enonglana , nom deuvm , ten Yesus noinda alohvnam , wo osva nonamba himba di aevulna Yesusmongo . Nonamba doa okombava singvel vevna .
43001040	No indhanarini samblava , temba ehengva wulengavnamba Yesusmba , nonamba Yonmba ehellenamba , ona , Yonmba ishomnav Yesusm . No indhanarini samblava , mongova Endru , himba Simon Pitana boasalal .
43001041	Wo boasna himba silelguana hevna boasalalmsna Simonm . Hev omnana Simonm , doa kava enonglai Mesaiamba . ( Mesaiava osm uv , Kristus , temba Sesoava pusvundthoanamba . )
43001042	Wo doa os Endruva Simonmba Yesusindamba waingana . Wo Yesusva nonglanamba Simonmba , wo omnana , yimba Simon , Yonna ombol . Yemba henga kava os awov , Sipas . Sipasva osm uv , Pita , memba elhonmsna av .
43001043	Doa mongnasimba nengvna Yesusva , galm Galili provinsram . Himba boasna gana , Pilipm omnana , yeoa kam pethamno .
43001044	Pilippa himba Betsaita kembellini lohvna , Endrui Yoni ten elohvnam nomini .
43001045	Pilippa nonglanamba Natanielmba , wo omnana , nengo nom , Moses ten novol venam lohohmora , ona , indhanariniva si provav , wo eva moashulnindva hemomba novol vewol vina . Doa kava hemba nunglina . Himba Yesus , Yosepna ombol . Himba Nasaret kembellini .
43001046	Wo Natanielva omnana Pilipmba , Nasaretma , wo es hevpa mana vema besal phovrama Nasaretriniva ? Pilip ophona , prorava , nonglo .
43001047	Yesusva nonglana , Natanielva ten prov kaindam . Hev ona , hona indhanariniva memba Israelnindrininonoa . Moakokomomba owaimomolmba heindava kethalohvmoa .
43001048	Wo Nataniel omnana , es hevpa yimba kamba osva lihei ? Yesus ophona , kava yemba nonglai , yimba avna fiksingi , Pilippa yemba mendah ishomnimoa kamomba .
43001049	Wo Natanielva mengpoavna omnana Yesusmba , guru , yimba Sesoana ombolnonoa . Yimba king kuwul luhunv pina Israelnindnamba .
43001050	Yesus omnana Natanielm , yimba undnahonam kamba lohmanav , noinda kava yemba ishomni , os kava yemba nonglai , yimba avna fiksingi . Tanam yimba si mana vemamba mendeklimba nongalvav pevna novna , honamba kuvhoavav .
43001051	Wo doa hev unna , kava tanam yemba ishunv , yimba si nunglivav , ovpa velaiha endvra . Wo yimba si nungeilvra , Sesoana ovsongolnindva si ahalapiha vevra yimondramsna kaindava , kava arana ombol lohv .
43002001	Os sambla ninmba vewulnamba , diva onganung vevna Keina kembellava Galili provinsrava . Yesusna avalva di doara kusovna .
43002002	Eva Yesusmba hevtindinahonam doara das owol vina no onganungramba .
43002003	Wainpva hlipianamba , nomba diva novnangas viwul vevna , Yesusna aval ombolm omnana , himba wainpolva mongova wuleivvmoa .
43002004	Yesus omnana , ava , manam yimba eva kamba omnav , kanamba nambaiva mendah provmoa , mendekliandrava velmba .
43002005	Wo avalva ishunvna andranindmba , yeoa nooa wohvinivm , himba temba yemba nomba unvrava , velmba .
43002006	Wo no deuvrava blekkumbiva diva indvlohvna 6pelara , osm pom ivsho vewolalm noindam . Yutanindva noinda hevm poswolalm , osm hevna wevolm engivra . Mendeklikumbi indvlohvna , pomba os lungundv , velohlohvna 100 lita . Honna vewol vina .
43002007	Yesus unna nom andranindm , ivsho vewol viu hona blekra . Wo himba sovhowol vivna , venamba , doa ambo sovhoral vungu vevna .
43002008	Doa hev henga unna , wo henga mengellinioa veltharombol vivrava , doa tihna aralm wulangamno . Doa wulangamnanamba , wo hev bes nenamba , doara wainpolalm nilhana . Wo hev tit vena , hinimini vrei ? Andranindva nonora lovahvna , temba himba pomba wulanganamba . Wo doa tihna aralva das ovra no angotalaim ,
43002009	
43002010	wo hev omnana , memba wainpolva besalangas . Indhanana wevsava yimba engivmoa , himba os vewol viv , himba boasna wainpova besal moang vi , wo sismba indhanamba mindnam hlapiarava , himba wainpova sahoklalva moang vi . Heva os yimba owai , yimba doara komandhai besalva wainpova , wo daipota men yimba wulprov .
43002011	Memba Yesus seilnovra vena hevna mendekliandramba , himba di Keina kembella vena Galili provinsra . Di himba hevna pusambakambamba novpa wuleihinna , osm ora keknasowol wohlohv . Wo hevtindiva os hemba undnahonamba keknamba lohvhoapramnana .
43002012	Nonamba Yesusva wonsihavnamba Kapaniam kembellamba nomba avalm , towandaslalm , hevtindim hevnam . Wo himba ambo uvsimbaihana diva Kapaniamba .
43002013	Wo nonamba doa mumra vinvna Yutanindnamba mendekliva tihva Pasovatihva . Wo Yesusva Yerusalemramba gavna .
43002014	Wo di peilla tempelduvrava himba ona nongalna , indhanamba men esvowolv sapina sipsipna tuawana leumbtuwana . Monglamba nongalna , himba hevna meyara aevluwul vevna , sembayangnindna diva dumbuluhunvna , wo tempelna diva dembrehunvna hemba .
43002015	Doa Yesusva saong vranamba , nona di esvema vinvna sapina sipsipnam manam manam , wolapho velm . Wo osoa phona , meyam mulgothunnamba , diva nomba opihalohvna petharam , temba among vevnamba esesmba .
43002016	Wo hev unna , nomba temba leumbtuwava esvowolvnamba , wonpulvo honaoa lelnam honaminioa , hengava manam yimba hulvui iambvav , wo kana arana deuvm maketduvulm vrivm .
43002017	Hevtindiva nunglinamba , nomba temba himba vinvnamba hemba , himba henga ningvna , nom ten novol velohvnam Sesoana doaramini tombaimora , Sesoa , deuvoa yenaoa ambo povawinvra indhanam , os kanamba undva suwemsna vuvrev .
43002018	Wo Yutanindna kuwul umnina Yesusm , kana novra boasna vintok mendekliandra . Nonglalm , osm ora , yimba lehra tempelduvmba ovuni .
43002019	Wo Yesus unna , tetga viu hona tempelduvm , kava si henga vevav samblamong okombanam .
43002020	Yutanind opulvona , yimba gekala ov , indhanamba vina 46pelara tahonmba , vinamba hona tempelduvpa . Wo tanam yimba nengvma , osva kava vevav hengava samblamong okombanam ?
43002021	Heva os tempelmba , Yesusva ambo olhmona olhinvna hevna nihm .
43002022	Sism hev ten phonam pokamarini , hevtindiva ningvna , nomba Yesusva os ona . Wo noinda himba kek vithivna doaramini tombaimomba , eva moam , nom Yesus ten ishovnam .
43002023	Yesusva di avna Yerusalemra , nomba mendekli tihva phunvnamba Yutanindnamba . Indkumbiva indhanamba hemba keknam undnahonam lovahthamnavna , noinda himba hevna novna nunglivnam , mendekliandra hev vevnam .
43002024	Heva os Yesusva hemba ninginvnamoa , osva lehra kalmangas , manara noinda himba lihawol vinvna hena nengavnangmba .
43002025	Himba nengvnamoa , osmba mongo indhanarini ishomnara kamoa indhanamomoa . Manara , Yesusva hevpa lihawol vinvna indhanana nengavnangmba .
43003001	Mongo indhanarini lohvna , nihilva henamba Nikotemus , himba Varisinindrini . Wo himba mongo mendekli kuwul wulluhunvna Yutanindna .
43003002	Sinimba Nikotemusva provna Yesusindam . Hev omnana , guru , kava nonora lohv , osva yimba guru prona Sesoanamini . An eva mongova vevav mendekliandrava , osva yimba memba vevpa , heva os Sesoa hev waivevra hemba .
43003003	Yesus omnana , lehra yimba ov , heva os kava tanam yemba ishomnav . Indhanariniva hengava nemelalmba lohmba owai vetava , himba nomba osva sihavavmoa Sesoana nemeltindirava . Oi , aval henga hemba lenge .
43003004	Wo Nikotemus ophona , wo es hevpa , osva indhanariniva mundkolal , wo hengava hemba lingvav ? Himba es eva sihavav hengava avalna emerava , osmba henga sleiha sism ?
43003005	Yesus omnana , kava ishomnav yemba tanam . Indhanariniva owai vetava , nemelalmba loholmba pona eva Sesoa songolnanamba , himba nomba osva sihavavmoa Sesoana nemeltindirava .
43003006	Nomba temba nihnamba nengandvrivpa , temba nihna . Wo nomba Sesoasongolnanamba phovpa , temba und nemel Sesoanamini .
43003007	Ata ye muembta angaviluhvav , memba kava yemba ishomnavpa , yeoa indkumbimoa henga nemelalm nilhapro .
43003008	Nengo , vuviva dalohvpa nosis nosis hevna nengavnangna . Yimba hellev , vuvi olv . Wo heva os yimba tit vev , vuviva henamini prov , hem hengava gav ? Eva Sesoasongolva osta , himba indhanamba temba nemelalmba vinvpa .
43003009	Nikotemusva os osahmanavna , honamba osva es hevpa , osva vevav ?
43003010	Yesus omnana , yimba mendekli guru luhunv Israelnindna . Wo heva os owai , yimba mendah levrapivongovmoa honamba ?
43003011	Kava ishomnav yemba tanam . Kava ishuv , kav ten nonora avm . Kava ishuv , nom kav ten nunglinam . Wo heva os yimba nomba vreinamoa , temba nomba kava ishuniva yemba .
43003012	Kava ishunvna yemba manam manam hona petharinim , wo heva os yimba kamba hillivnamoa . Wo eva osta , yimba ata kamba hillivavmoa , kava yemba manam manam ishunvrava senaminimba Sesoanaminiva .
43003013	Manara , owai , indanamba mongova indhanariniva vonganamoa Sesoaindamba . Kava arana ombol lohv . Arana ombolangas , hengas nominiva venamba , os holapena .
43003014	Yimba nonora av , nemetva Mosesva wikleihana tira sena saiholamsnamba , nonam di sahal pethara aevulvnam . Eva osta arana ombolva . Arana ombolmba eva osta wikleihivav .
43003015	Wo indkumbiva himba nomba undnahonamba lovahthamnavrava , himba nomba si wohavav yunalmangas .
43003016	Manara , Sesoava mindnam und vewol vena indhanam hona pethanindm , wo noinda hevna mongal ombolm wolaihaprana hom . Wo himba nomba ombolmba keknamba undnahonamba lovahthamnavrava , himba si sewonamba owolakovvavmoa , heva os wohavav yunalm .
43003017	Sesoava wolaihapranamoa hevna ombolmba petharamba , lesvhoawol velmba pethanindmba , heva lopshalm pethanindm hevnanam .
43003018	Noinda himba nomba keknamba undnahonamba lohmanavrava Sesoana ombolmba , si hemba nomba omnavavmoa , os yimba doa owolakohai . Heva os himba nomba keknamba lohmanamba owai venatava , doa himba owolakohai . Manara , himba Sesoana mongal ombolm undnahonam lohmanavmoa .
43003019	Men plalvata , honana indhanamba doa owolakovv . Kava woklasnamba Sesoanaminiva doa prunna pethanindm . Wo heva os pethanindva und vivmoa hona woklamba . Himba und viv sim , noinda himba vivpa sahoklalm manam manam .
43003020	Indkumbiva himba nomba temba sahonamba vivpa , himba ovuv woklamba . Himba si provavmoa woklaramba , noinda si homeis ambara vethamnavm manam manam nom sahoklalm , ten hev vevm .
43003021	Wo heva os henomba engvrava moanonoamba , woklakambara aevulv , Sesoana moarava kava vewol viv , woklakowa lehra lovhoaku vinv .
43003022	Doa venamba , Yesusva wongavna hevtindimba Yutia provinsnahalm . Wo di Yesusva wonavnamba hevtindimba , pona poswol vawovna indhanamba .
43003023	Eva Yonmba di pona poswol vawovnata Ainonda murapeta Salimda , manara noinda diva mindnam pomba lungu vevna . Indhanamba ahui vevna , domba gawolmba , pona posvralmba .
43003024	Memba nonam , mendah Yonmba buimeramba wolaihasuvnamoa .
43003025	Mongla Yon Baptaisna hellelnind waialhuvna mongom Yutanindrinim , noinda Yutanindna hevna wevsa , hevm pona poswolalm .
43003026	Wo hev ambanamba Yonindam , umnina , guru , nengmano indhanarinim , nom ye ten nemet oholohnam mongnamilm Yotan pora , ten pev hemom ishomana vinvnam , osm ora , himba Kristus lohv . Himba pona poswol vawov , wo indhanamba ten heindamba ahui vev , gawovpa , ponamba poswolalmba heindamba .
43003027	Yon unna , lehra Yesusva nomba temba vevpa osva , manara , Sesoana aralna nengavnangra nomba temba phov .
43003028	Yimba pevpa kamba hella vrivna , ovna , os ishov , kava Kristusva owai . Kava ambo noi , Sesoa kamba wolaihaprana , monam kokolma vremnalm hem .
43003029	Memba osm , mongova indhanariniva ongamba vravpa , wo no ungevliriniva no tendorinina . Wo hena sehelva ambo aongmangas vev no angotalaina moamba , hellengas wohvev . Wo kava eva osta , kava honi mongal undva wulluhmanav Kristusmba . Wo doa osva kamba undnahonam wohkanandhai .
43003030	Henaoa nihiloa mendekli senaoa wohlohra , kamoa kuvhoara he .
43003031	Himba nomba temba pronamba senaminiva , mendeklinonoa , manam manam wohkuvhoawol vev . Indhanariniva hona pethariniva , himba honamangas engv , himba petharinimangas ishunv , nom manam manam ten lohvm pethara . Wo heva os himba nomba temba pronamba senaminiva , he mendeklinonoava luhunv manana manana .
43003032	Himba ishunvra , nom hev ten vena , nonglanam , eva hellevnam , heva os owai , mongova ovranamoa , nomba temba ishovnamba himba .
43003033	Heva os mongova indhanariniva himba nomba vravrava , nomba temba himba ishunvpa , doa vilipivongoi , osva Sesoava tanamolnam ishov .
43003034	Sesoa hevna ombolmba wolaihaprana , wo himba ishunvna manam manam pimba , nom Sesoa ten ishonam . Manara , Sesoava hemba pemila vrena mindnam hevsongolnanamba .
43003035	Manara , aralva und vev mindnam ombolmba , wo himba moalamangva kovoraohna , kuwulm wulluhunilm , nonam manimani memba lohvpa .
43003036	Himba nomba keknamba lohmanavrava ombolmba , himba nomba si yunalm avav . Wo heva os himba nomba hellemba owai vevrava ombolmba , si himba yunalmba almba owolakovvav . Wo Sesoana wusprolva luhunvra heinda , daipota verava , sewonam .
43004001	Varisinindva ahalovna , ona , Yesusva mindnam pona poswol vev indhanamba hevtindimba , wo hena henga kuvhoawol vev Yon Baptaismba .
43004002	Heva os owai tanamba , Yesusva ponamba poswol vevnamoa indhanamba . Hevtindi poswol vivna .
43004003	Wo Yesusva doara nonora lohvna , osva Varisinindva doa hillina kanamba . Wo himba nominiva venamba Yutia provinsriniva , henga gana Galili provinsram .
43004004	Wo monamba himba gavnamba , himba Samaria provinshovmonam gavna .
43004005	Diva Yesusva ganamba , mongona kembella pho , os sevre vrivna , Sikar . Nomba kembelva di mura lohvna ten petha , noi Yakop kovoraohnam hevna ombolm Yosepm nemet doara .
43004006	Yakopnamba tovalpva di nolhra lohvna . Yesusva ganamba , kemongla uwit vilomnanamba , di dawonam eha vawovna , no tovalp popethalla . Wo nonamba doa okombava hovrahovra lohvna .
43004007	Samaria ongoriniva provna , tovalpm vralm . Yesus omnana hemba , ai , kam vraho po , ka nei .
43004008	Memba honamba nonam vena , hevtindiva di mendah kembella inne esvowolahavna wowonam .
43004009	Wo no ungevlirini ophona , kava nihvavk vei , osra yimba kam osahmanavna pom . Wo es hevpa osva yimba Yutanindrini , eva kava Samaria ongorini ? Himba noinda osva ona , Yutanindva sesehnamba ahavmoa Samarianindmongova .
43004010	Yesus omnana , yimba mendah tit vev , nomba manimani Sesoava nis ambo daswolvpa . Wo eva yimba tit vevnata , osva an yemba osahmanavna pomba . Yimba doarava lihatava , yimba ata osahmanata kamba , wo ata kava vraohta pomba yemba , noi yunalm nonapopolm alm .
43004011	Wo ungevlirini omnana , wo hinimini yimba ata pomba vravav , nonapopolmba yunalmba almba ? Tovalpva eva mani huimura livma , wo eva yimba mana vemava wulluhvmoa , nonamba veltha vralmba .
43004012	Wo es hevpa ye mendekliva lohvma Yakopnamba , pina simbelnamba ? Himba kamba vraohna hona tovalpva . Himba nawovna hevpa honamini . Eva hevna ombtowondalva deuvtatava hlavna honamini .
43004013	Yesus ophona , indkumbiva himba nomba hlavrava honamba pomba , si henga hemba peha vinvra .
43004014	Wo heva os himba nomba nevrava pomba , nomba kava temba daswolvrava , si hemba hengava pehava vinvramoa . Wo pomba honamba kava daohvpa , si nilhavav puthovhoal-pomsna , hena nihmerava livra . Manara , kava si hemba undva vraohvav , nonapopolm yunalm wohalm .
43004015	Wo no ungevlirini omnana , vraho kam honi po . Osm si homeis henga kam peha venavm . Wo kava si henga homeis provm hom , vralm pom .
43004016	Wo doa Yesus omnana , gao , omnakao pevna tlapevm , wo waipro hom .
43004017	Wo no ungevlirini ophona , owai , kava tlahui av . Yesus omnana hemba , yimba lehra oi , osva kava av tlahui .
43004018	Heva os es eva yenamba tlalva 5pelarava lovahvna . Wo memba daipotava yimba hona indhanariniiva ahavpa , yenamba tlalva owai . Yimba kamba honamba tanam wohishomni .
43004019	Wo no ungevlirini omnana , kava os nonglav yemba , os yimba mongo moashulnindrini Sesoana .
43004020	Kana simbehumunmba sembayang velvohvna hona olora Samariara . Wo heva os yimba Yutanind owai , yimba os undva wulaevvna , diangas Yerusalemrangas heva lehrava indhanamba Sesoamba sembayang vewuvmonav .
43004021	Yesus omnana , kam hello , doa nambaiva mumra prov , nonamba indhanamba si atonglavavmoa , osva vevra , Yerusalemram , eva hona Samaria olorava , sembayang vewuvmonalmba kana aramba . Owai , si vavawonam sembayangmba vilangavra .
43004022	Yimba Samarianindva nom sembayang vewuvmona velvohinvna Sesoam , nom ten pev tit vrivm . Wo heva os kava Yutanindva liheivna Sesoamba , nomba kava temba sembayang vinivnamba . Manara , honamba moamba , memba Sesoava indhanamba lopshavpa monakoklariniva , moamba honamba ka Yutanind eishoraohv .
43004023	Wo heva os nambaiva doa mura vev , nonamba osmba sembayangnindnonoava si sembayang vinivra aram Sesoasongolnapopol eva moanonoana wevsana . Doa phoi , noinda honam snam sembayangmba , aramba undva vev .
43004024	Manara , Sesoava ivtovol nihilhui . Noinda hindva nomba temba sembayang vinivpa Sesoamba , heoa sembayang vivra Sesoasongolnapopol eva moanonoana wevsana .
43004025	Wo henga ungevlirini omnana , kava nonora av , osva Mesaiava si provav . ( Mesaiava osm uv , Kristus . ) Nonamba Mesaiava si provavpa , himba si temura ishunvra manam manam pimba .
43004026	Wo Yesus omnana , kata , kava men yemba ishomnav .
43004027	Yesusva ona mendah ishona , hevtindi ambna kembellini . Wo himba evekingil vithina , noinda himba nunglivna , Yesusva waiisholohv ungevlirinim . Wo heva os mongova hevtindiriniva osahmanavnamoa , osva manam yimba vev ? , manaram yimba waiishov hemba ?
43004028	Wo nomba ungevliriniva sumbva di pelehavna , hevpa henga gavna kembellam . Hev ganamba , unnam nom tendona onganam ,
43004029	indhanarini ishomniva kam , osva owai , mani eva shalohoi , nomba temba kava vaomana vevnamba . Prapiao , angarava , nungli . Es heva Kristusmi ?
43004030	Wo indhanamba kembelnindva hulom awona , angavna , nonglalm Yesusm .
43004031	Nonamba no ungevliriniva tukvihavnamba , wo hevtindi umnina , guru , neo boasna .
43004032	Wo heva os Yesus unna , kava iav innemba , nelmba , nomba yimba levrapivolvmoa .
43004033	Wo hevtindiva hevm asahmana ungu vevna , es hevpa , mongova doarava ipromnaima Yesusmba innemba ?
43004034	Doa Yesus unna , kanamba innemba , nom velm , henoi ten hom kam wolaihapranam , manam manam henam velm . Kanamba innemba , lelnam vipialm andram , nom hev ten vraohnam kam velm .
43004035	Yimba os olvohv , weisva mendah samblasambla lovahv , innesrava si os avav nonam . Heva os yem ka ishunv , pevna aong lelahao , keknam mumuvul veo osonnam , doa osonnava nihilangas lohprav .
43004036	Eva daipotava , indhanariniva nomba temba sevrava osonnamba , hemba doa diva dembrahunv . Himba osonnamba huhul vev , nonam yunalm wohalm . Wo noinda daipotava heoa indk evethavra , vei ten wolanam , eva henoi ten sevm .
43004037	Memba tanam , nonamba pivva uvpa osva , mongo indhanarini wolangav miva , wo heva os mongnindrini seprav sisva osonnava .
43004038	Kava yemba wolanga vungu vena , aiselm osonnam , nom diva yimba andra vinamoa . Mongnind andra vina , wo yimba ambo hena andrara dumbunvra mindnam hengava .
43004039	Wo doa nomba Samarianindva tendona ongana keknam lovahthamnavna undnahonam Yesusmba . Himba undnahonamba av , noinda nom ten ungevlirini ishunnam , hev unna , himba wohishoi temura kanamba , nomba nemetva temba kava vevnamba .
43004040	Wo Samarianindva prapiavna Yesusindamba , ishumnivna mindnam , wonalm hevm . Wo himba noinda vewolna samblaninmba diva .
43004041	Wo doa esvema ambo lovahthamnavna undnahonamba , noinda manam manam hev ten ishunvnam .
43004042	Wo hev umnina no ungevlirinim , seilmba kava undnahonam lovahthamnavna Yesusmba , noinda ye kam nom ishunnam . Wo heva os daipotava kava keknam av undnahonam , noinda kava kav hilliva . Kava nonora av , os men hona indhanarinita , hengamba indhanam lopshalmba pethanindmba .
43004043	Nomba samblaninmba vewolnamba , sismba Yesusva nominiva venamba , gavna Galili provinsram .
43004044	Manara , Yesusva doara ona , nemetva os moashulnindrinimba hevna kembelnindva beswonamba longong vrivmoa .
43004045	Nonamba Yesusva phonamba Galilirava , wo diva indhanamba hemba windemona ohul vrivna . Himba doara ambnata eva no mendekli tihramba Yerusalemrava , wo diva himba doa nungeilna Yesusna mendekliandramba .
43004046	Yesusva henga nungsis velm gavna Keina kembellam Galiliram . Men huita doarava Yesusva weihaloh vrena pomba wainpolalmba . Doa nonamba mongo kuwul himba di avna Kapaniam kotara . Himba king kuwulna andranindrini , wo hena ombolmba uvavul venavna .
43004047	Wo no kuwulva hellena , ona , Yesusva doa prona Yutia provinsriniva , men av daipotava hui Galili provinsra . Wo himba gamnavna , Yesusm yinavana ovralm hem , prolm Kapaniamram , wo sishona vrelm ombolm . Otolva doa murapeta dahapiav .
43004048	Yesus omnana , yimba hona indhanamba ambo osm viv , boasna kava heva nunglivrava mendekliandramba kavna novna , wo os heva kava undnahonamba lovahthamnavra hemba .
43004049	Wo no kuwul omnana , guru , lelnam pro , ata homeis lelnam otolm kana dahavm .
43004050	Yesus ophona , gao , otolva ata yenamba beswonam avav . Wo no kuwulva wohkek vethana , nom ten Yesus ishomnanam , wo os gana deuvramba .
43004051	Wo monaram hevna andranindva ambvna , anongla venamba . Hev umnina , yenamba ombpevpa doa beswonam av .
43004052	Wo hev sah owol vevna , unna , wo henanam hevpa okombava hi lohvna , os kana ombva kanandhana ? Hev umnina , okombava mara koho lohvhoavnama ambo , os nihvuvrava hemba wuleihana .
43004053	Wo aralva nengna , okombava nonamba koho lohvhoavnamba , nonamba Yesusva osva onamba , yenamba ombpevpa ata henga kanandhavav . Wo doa vena , no indhanarini , eva noi ten avna hena deuvra , himba doa Yesusmba keknam undnahonam lovahthamnana .
43004054	Memba honamba mendekliandrava Yesusva hengava sismba venamba , himba Yutia provinsrini pronamba , Galili provinsra avnamba , os vena .
43005001	Wo sismba Yesusva gavna Yerusalemba , Yutanindna mendekli tihram .
43005002	Wo diva Yerusalemrava doara mongova tovalpva livna , wo ovavholmba vuhemba 5pelara vewol velohvna tovalpsisva . Wo Hiprumonamba os sevriv , Betesta . Wo nomba tovalpva di mura livna kotapultuvrava , os ningthiv sipsipna tuv .
43005003	Uvavulmungilnindva ovna mana ema vendholahola vev no ovavhollava diva tovalpsisva . Monglava novtitmungil , monglava monglakoklana , monglava kemindina .
43005005	Wo nomba uvavulnindva , doara di mongova vendholotholohvna ovavholla , himba uvavulmba os dihelomana vena , venamba , tahonmba ambo os lohmanavna 38pelara .
43005006	Yesusva nonglanamba no indhanarinimba , wo nengna , himba noi ambo doaramini snangas wohvindilv . Wo doa venamba , Yesus osahmana , es hevpa , yimba os nengvma , kamoa henga kanandhara ?
43005007	Wo no uvavulmungilnindrini ophona , eye , heva os owai , an eva ata kamba aiv vindilpihavta tovalpmeramba , nonamba pomba punivtiva vevnamba ? Kava lehlohvna , osm kasna mi kaoa pihai pomeraoa . Wo heva os nonamba kava lehlohvnamba , owai , monglava indhanamba kamba aiv vreipra vrelvohvna sism .
43005008	Wo doa Yesus omnana , phorava , undund lohvhoao . Pevna vuhesal dombrava , gao .
43005009	Wo nungi lelnam ambo hemba wohlesvhoana . Wo himba hevna vuhesal dombnamba , os gana . Hona okombanamba manimani himba memba vevnamba , vah iaevul okombanam .
43005010	Wo Yutanindva umnina no indhanarinimba , temba Yesusva sishona vrenamba , detiva vah iaevul okombanamba , aembu , ata ye pevna vuhesal ingavav deti , yimba pivnam lohohmom pilpikohav memba osva .
43005011	Wo heva os hev unna , indhanariniva temba kamba hengamba sishona vreiva , omni kamba , os dombrava pevna vuhesal , gao .
43005012	Wo hev osihminina , wo an no indhanariniva , temba yemba wuhhoiva , dombolmba pevna vuhesalva , ivohalmba ?
43005013	Wo heva os no indhanariniva , himba tit venavna , osva an dihi himba . Manara , indhanamba no kembellava novpa es eva ata piasovta , wo nokulmonam Yesusva dasvovhoana nominiva .
43005014	Wo sism henga Yesusva no indhanarinimba ona nonglana , men av tempelmera . Wo hev omnana , hello , yemba doa wohkanandhana . Wo hengava manam yimba sahonamba vevav , osra si mana vemava mendekli nonglaphovav yemba .
43005015	Wo no indhanariniva phonamba , ga , owalm Yutanindm yih . Hev unna , noita Yesusva , ten sishona vrenam kam .
43005016	Yesusva vena honamba vah iaevul okombanam . Wo noinda Yutanindna kuwulva sahonam venalm vinivna hemba .
43005017	Wo heva os hev unna , kanamba aramba wuleihanamoa andrava . Wo kava eva os andra vevta .
43005018	Wo hona moamba nomba Yutanindna kuwulmba otuhtuvna , himba keknam lihvna , helvakomandhalmangas Yesusmba . Hev una , seilmba lohohmomba vah iaevullinim pilpikohana . Wo hev vena , os ona , Sesoava hena aralnonoa . Wo os himba hevmba os vrev , kava lohohra Sesoaiva elohv .
43005019	Yesus kuwulmba nomba opla vrinna , kava ishunv yemba tanam . Ombolva mana vemava vevavmoa hevna nengavnangnamba . Ombolva vev nongas , ten hev nonglavm , nom aral vevm . Ombolva nomba temba vevpa , aralva eva nomba vevta .
43005020	Aralva mindnam und vev ombolmba , wo aralva novpa wolaihamnav ombolmba , noindava manimani himba hevpa temba vevpa . Wo heva os aralva si novpa wolaihamnavav ombolmba manam manam mendeklim , honamba kana mendekliandramba henga kuvhueivra . Wo yimba indkumbiva si evekingil vruwul vevra .
43005021	Aramba wolapho vewol vev indhanamba , nomba temba dalvpa , wo undnonoava henga daswolv hemba . Wo eva osta ombolva daswolv undva , nomba temba hevpa ninginvpa hemba .
43005022	Wo eva aramba lesvhoawol vevmoa indhanamba . Wo heva os aralva doa ombolm moalamangva kovoraohna , indhanamba lesvhoawolalmba .
43005023	Sesoava honamba osm vena , indkumbiva indhanamba si longong vrivra ombolmba , os ten hev longong vrinvm aralm . Himba longong vremba owai vivrava ombolmba , eva aralmba longong vrivmoata , hem nomba temba ombolmba wolaihapranamba .
43005024	Kava ishunv yemba tanam . Himba nomba hillivrava , nomba temba kava ishovrava , wo undnahonamba lovahthamnavrava hemba , nomba temba kamba wolaihapranamba , himba si beswonam avav yunalm . Hemba si lesvhoawol vivavmoa , osva ora , himba indkokla vivna . Heva os himba doa doara wuleihina dahalmba , wo saivna , alm yunalm daipotava .
43005025	Kava ishunv yemba tanam . Doa nambaiva mura vev , wo doa phona , indhanamba temba sihanamba , himba si hillivra moalamangmba Sesoana ombolnamba . Wo himba nomba si hillivrava , himba si undna beswonam avav .
43005026	Undva nonapopolmba almba , phov aranamini hevnamini . Wo aralva wolaihana ombolm , osva henamini vravra , undva nonapopolmba almba .
43005027	Wo aralva vraohna ombolmba moalamangva , lesvhoawolalm , noinda himba lohvna aralna ombol .
43005028	Manam yimba nengavnangva vivra mindnamba honamba . Doa nambaiva mura vev , nonamba temba doarava hemba dalnamba , wo pokamara shav , si hillivra hena moalamangmba .
43005029	Wo himba si os phosohvra hevna pokamariniva . Wo nomba temba beswonamba himba vivnamba , si wolapho vevra , wo avra undnapopolm yunalm . Wo heva os himba temba sahonamba manimani vivnamba , hemba si wolapho vevra , lesvhoawolalm , osra doara doa yimba owolakovvna .
43005030	Yesusva mendah ishunvna Yutanindna kuwulm , kava es eva vevav mana vemava kavna nengavnangnamba , owai . Kava nomangas wohengv , ten kam omnanam velm hev , wo noinda kanamba lesvhoawolalmba lehra lohv . Manara , kava kavna nengavnangnamba vevmoa . Kava osm vev , heoa und lothora , temba himba kamba wolaihapranamba .
43005031	Kava kavhova yemba ishunilmba kavna andramba vevrava , yimba si kek vithivramoa , nomba ishunvrava kava yemba .
43005032	Wo heva os ten mongova indhanariniva lohv , himba kamomba ishomana vinv . Wo kava nonora , nomba manam manam himba ishomana vevnamba kamomba , tanam . Memba kana ara .
43005033	Yimba doara wolanga vivna indhanamba Yon Baptaisindam . Wo himba yemba ishunvna moanonoam kamom .
43005034	Kava mindnamba nengvmoa , osva Yon Baptaisva ishovra kamomba . Heva os kava ov honamba , osm yimba si kamba undnahonamba lovahthamnavrava , wo Sesoava yemba si lopshavav .
43005035	Yonmba sna lohvna , ovna , tav woklasowa . Wo yimba indkumbiva indk vithivna henambarava nonam .
43005036	Wo heva os kanamba nethalmba noi mendekli , Yonna kamomba henga kuvhoav . Noi manimani mendekliandram , men kav vewol vevm , nom nethalmba nungliv . Memba manimani , noi ten ara kam dembraohnam velm . Noi mendekliandrara osva nungliv , ara kamba wolaihaprana .
43005037	Wo ara henoi , ten kam wolaihapranam , hev kamomba ishov . Heva os yimba es eva hillivav hena moamba . Wo yimba es eva nunglivav , osva ora , snal himba dihi av ?
43005038	Henamba moamba yimba kek vithivmoa , manara , yimba keknamba undnahonamba lovahthamnavmoa , nomba temba aramba wolaihapranamba hemba .
43005039	Yimba temura beswonam levrapivolalm viv tombaimomba doaraminim , manara , yimba os ningv , kamba daswolv , beswonam alm yunalm . Heva os nomba temba mongawa tombaimomba doaraminiva ishov kamom .
43005040	Heva os yimba kongswil vev , ambalmba kaindamba , osalmba kaoa yunalm beswonam ai .
43005041	Kava provmoa , osmba kana nihilmba wivivra .
43005042	Heva os kava yemba os nongalv , yimba Sesoamba undvivmoa .
43005043	Manara , kava prona kavna aranamini , kava hena moamba wulprona . Wo heva os yimba pevna undnahonamba kamba holvoreivmoa . Heva mongova indhanariniva provpa , wo himba ishovpa moamba , hevmangas ishov , wo yimba hemba holvoreiv .
43005044	Yimba osm viv , kamoa okolowol vivra henoi henoi . Wo heva os yimba ningvmoa mindnamba , osm Sesoa kamoa okolowol vevra , himba temba mongal avpa . Wo es hevpa eva yimba undnahonamba lovahthamnavav kamba ?
43005045	Manam yimba osva ningvav , kava si yemba ishunvav arana novra , osva yimba indkokla vivna . Moses si yemba wetat owol vevav , osva yimba indkoklava wohvivna . Wo yimba hem osva ningminiv , he si kamba wonolohvav .
43005046	Yimba tanamba keknamba undnahonamba Mosesmba amnatava , eva yimba kamba os amnavrata , manara noinda Mosesva novol vewol vena kamom .
43005047	Wo heva os yimba kek vithivmoa honamba , memba Mosesva novol vewol venamba . Wo noinda osva es eva yimba kek vithivav , nomba temba kava ishovpa .
43006001	Wo doa venamba , sismba himba gavna mongnahalmba Galili plombpethallam , ambo weihaloh vriv , vev , os sevriv , Galiliplomb , eva Taiperiasplomb .
43006002	Indhanamba ahuiva vevna , hemba sismba telgalmba , noinda himba hevna novna nunglivnam mendekliandram , hev ten sishona vewol vevnam uvavulnindm .
43006003	Doa mongnahal wonphonamba , olora wonvonganamba , di wonovhoa .
43006004	Wo nonamba doa Yutanindva ungemira ovhoapihavna , tih mendekli mumra vinvnamba , Pasovatih .
43006005	Wo noinda Yesusva ona nov venga vena , indhanamba pomba ten kiheiv , os provna heindamangas dom . Hev omnana Pilipm , hi hevpa ata pivva innemba sovawol vivav , hona indhanamba dahwol velmba ?
43006006	Himba ambo osm Pilipm lehvna , verava , ora os ov Pilipkowa . Hevpa doara nengna , osmba ona , ata kava os vevav .
43006007	Wo Pilip ophona , owai , pivva heva boasna mongawawusnam diandrava vivav , di wulkusovav , esvemam rotim dombolm , osm indakondam singthalm hem ambo , osm eskand eskand .
43006008	Mongova hevtindiriniva doara di lohvna Endru . Himba Simon Pitana boasalal . Endru ona ,
43006009	men mongo tuendisrini ilohvpa 5pelara bali bretva , tambkova sambla . Wo heva os honamba ata lehra vethavavmoa sna indhanamba .
43006010	Yesus unna , os ishunu hemoa , ovhoaprara . ( Ilva vavawonam lohv temba diva , wo indhanamba diva avnamba , nomba os avna 5,000pelara . )
43006011	Wo doa Yesusva nomba bretva dombnamba , nehvongo ovomnavna Sesoam , yimba lehra , no bretna , wo doa os povmang viwul vinvna no indhanamba , temba avnamba ilsrava . Wo eva tambkova os venata . Himba os dahwol vena , venamba , doa mengva indkokla vilunvna henamba .
43006012	Nonamba himba hlanamba , doa venamba , ambo lokovoko gavna , eva ata mana eram hengava uta , owai . Yesus unna hevtindim , eunumbuloa bretna tambkonaoa huhul viu , nooa temba nalohungu vevpa eunumbulva . Ata ye wuldiavav .
43006013	Wo himba vinamba , henga temura huhul vivna nomba eunumbulva , temba nalohungu vevnamba . Wo hengava songovranamba eunumbulva , 12pelara songoihalohna sumbrava nomba bretna tambkonamba .
43006014	Wo indhanamba nonamba no mendekliandramba nunglinamba , temba Yesusva vevnamba , hev una , himba dihi tanamolnam nomba moashulnindriniva , temba Sesoava wolaihapralmba onamba hona petharamba ?
43006015	Yesusva doara nonora lohvna , osva himba nengavnangva vrivna , kekel velm kam , waiangalm , aivol velm kam , king kuwulalm wulluhunilm hevm . Wo noinda himba nominiva venamba , os henga gana hevho oloram .
43006016	Wo no okomba vohanamba Yesustindiva peivna Galiliplombram .
43006017	Wo doara wohkilvrana , wo heva os mendah Yesusva engalpravnamoa hemba . Hevtindiva botra vongopianamba , doa ahnam os hiliwelgivna Kapaniamram .
43006018	Wo vuviva snavema dalohvna , wo vuviva vevnamba , otuhhovna plombm , plombva ovram vongavna .
43006019	Himba mara botva ambo os wulanganama 5pelami 6pelami kilomita tokwonamba . Wo himba ona nunglina , Yesusva ten posra sena prov botram murapetam . Wo hevtindiva pemba os viwul vevna i .
43006020	Wo heva os Yesus hev unna , manapenam yimba viv ? Memba ka .
43006021	Wo himba indk vithivna , wolaihavolalmba Yesusmba botramba . Wo nungi lelnam ambo pulvona , diva temba hevpa angavnamba domba .
43006022	Wo venamba , mongnasiva nomba indhanamba di mendah wohaevulvna mongnamilm Galiliplombnahalm , nomba temba Yesusva dahwol venamba innemba . Himba os ningvna , Yesusva dihi es vei , wongaimoa botrava hevtindimba , wo botva mongova owai .
43006023	Doa nonamba monglava Taiperiasrini botva pepra vei . Wo himba di pepavevna , ten nolhra hev inne mendekli hlanam .
43006024	Wo nomba indhanamba nunglina os , pai owai , Yesusva hevtindimba huiva wonlohvmoa . Wo himba nominiva vinamba , nomba botra vongopiengu venamba , angavna Kapaniam , aslaluvmona velm Yesusm .
43006025	Wo himba nonglapulvonamba diva Yesusmba mongnamilva plombrava . Hev umnina , guru , henanam yimba homba prona ?
43006026	Yesus unna , wo es hevpa yimba eva kam sah ambvma , noinda yimba kamba nunglina , kava mendekliandra vevna , wo yimba kam lovahthamnalm vevma ? Owai , yemba kava tanam ishunv . Yimba sah ambvna ambo kam , noinda yimba bret hlanamba , os venamba , ambo lokovoko gavna .
43006027	Hillu , innemba pethariniva lelnam ambo pindta vungav . Wo noinda osva manam yimba andra vivra , nomba innemba dombolmba . Heva os andra vivm , innem dombolm , nom nokrava si yimba yunalm wohavra . Arana ombol si yemba daswolvra no innemba . Sesoava aramba doa ambara velahana , osva himba hevpa waiav nihra arana ombolmba .
43006028	Wo no indhana umnina , manam Sesoava ninginv kamba , vinilmba ?
43006029	Yesus unna , andrava Sesoava yemba ninginvpa , men honam , keknam undnahonam lovahthamnalm , nom ten Sesoa hev wolaihapranam hom .
43006030	Wo no indhana opulvona , mani mendekliandrava ata yimba vevav ? Osm kava ata nunglivav nomba mendekliandrava , wo osva si kava yemba keknam undnahonamba lovahthamnavra . Ata es yimba vevav ?
43006031	Manara , tomonalva pinamba innemba manava hlana sahal pethara . Os novol velohv doaramini tombaimorava , Sesoa daswolna innemba senamini hemba , hlalmba .
43006032	Yesus unna , yemba kava ishunv tanam , owai Mosesva , temba pina simbehumunmba daswolnamba innemba senaminiva . Heva os kana ara vinna , wo daipotava himba yemba men daswolv innenonoava senaminiva .
43006033	Sesoana innemba , noi indhanarini , ten holvopenam senamini , wo henamini undnonoava vrav pethanindva huiva petharava .
43006034	Wo indhana henga noi opulvona , guru , eva yeoa no inneoa kamoa dahwol vawota elsus .
43006035	Wo Yesus ophona , ka menta innemba , nomba nokrava yunalmba almba . Himba nomba homba sihavrava , hem nomba si ponmba venavramoa hengava . Himba nomba keknamba lohmanavrava kamba , hemba nomba si hengava pehava venavramoa .
43006036	Yemba doa seilva kava ishuni , wo eva yimba doa kamba nungli , wo heva os owai , yimba kamba amnavmoa keknamba .
43006037	Aramba indhanamba pethanindmba kamangas wohwolamnav . Wo indakonda himba si pepra vevra kaindamba , wo kava ambo hemba holvorombolangas vevra .
43006038	Kava holvopena senaminiva , velm nom , kam Sesoa nengmanavram , nom velm . Kava osmba pronamoa , vevra manimani ambo kavna nengavnangna .
43006039	Wo noinda osva kava mongova bumbrisvavmoa , nomba temba Sesoava kamba wolamnanamba , wo kava hemba si wolapho vevav , nonam ovi pethai hoai evewolvram , Sesoava indhanamba lesvhoawol vevav . Memba honamba , himba kamba wolaihapranamba , himba nengmanav kamba , velm osm .
43006040	Indkumbiva himba nomba temba nunglinamba ombolmba , wo keknamba amnavnamba hemba , himba nomba av yunalm . Kava si wolapho vevav , nonam ovi pethai hoai evewolvram . Men honam , osm kana aramba undva vrev .
43006041	Wo doa Yutanindva eishomnavna mindnam Yesusmba . Himba eishovna noinda sahonamba , he os onamba , kava inne senamini venamba , holvopena petharam .
43006042	Himba hevm eishovna , memba himba Yesus . Pimba lihewulminiv aralimba avalimba henamba . Himba ambo Yosepna ombol . Wo es hevpa himba osva oi , kava holvopena senamini ?
43006043	Wo doa Yesus opla vrinna , beswonam ambo maivithu , ata ye kam sahonam ishumnivav .
43006044	Ara kamba wolaihaprana . Anvema mongo provav kaindam , heva os ara boasna hena nengavnangva tuhlohmanarava , wo os provra kaindamba . Wo ovi pethaiva hoai evewolvrava , si kava wolapho vevav hemba pokamariniva .
43006045	Moamba men novol velohv moashulnindna tombaira . Sesoava si numhowol vevav indkumbimba indhanamba . Wo indkumbiva himba nomba hillivrava aramba , nowolva henaminiva dumbvrava , himba si kaindam ambvra .
43006046	Mongova doava aramba nonglanamoa , henongas ten henoi pronam aranamini . Hengas doava nonglana aramba .
43006047	Yemba kava tanam ishunv , himba nomba kamba keknamba undnahonamba amnatava , himba si avav yunalm .
43006048	Manara , kava inne , noi yimba yunalm wohavav nonapopolm .
43006049	Pina simbehumunmba temba innemba manava hlanamba sahal petharava , wo heva os doara doa hemba wohdalpiana .
43006050	Heva os kava memba inne , noi ten holvopenam senamini . Wo himba nomba netava honamba innemba , hemba nomba si dahavavmoa .
43006051	Kava inne , noi nonapopolm yunalm alm , holvopena senamini . Wo himba nomba nevrava hona innemba , himba si yunalm wohavra . Memba honamba innemba , kana kavna nihilnonoa . Kava si daswolvra kavna nihil , osm pethanindva si nonapopol avra .
43006052	Wo nomba moamba Yutanindva ona hillina , wo hevm alhuvna . Hev uvnam , es hevpa hona indhanariniva si daswolvra hevna nihilva pimba , hlalmba ?
43006053	Wo henga Yesus unna , kava ishunv tanam yemba . Yeoa hlangas vevm arana ombolna nihiloa . Wo eva osoa hlamnavm hena tovoloa . Yimba honamba osmba owai vivrava , wo eva osva yimba si mananapopol wohavra yunalmba ?
43006054	Himba nomba kana nihilna tovolnamba hlavrava , himba nomba si wohaevulvra yunalm . Ovi pethaiva hoai evewolvrava , kava si hemba wolapho vungavav pokamariniva .
43006055	Kana nihilva innenonoa . Kana tovolva pononoa .
43006056	Himba nomba nevrava kana nihilna tovolnamba , himba kanamera avra , wo eva kava heinda avra .
43006057	Ara kamba wolaihaprana . Ara avpa , wo kava eva avta , manara noinda arainda . Wo noinda osva himba nomba temba hlavpa kana nihilva , si aevulvra yunalm , manara noinda himba kana nihilmengna .
43006058	Kava innemba snamba owai , temba pina simbehumunmba hlanamba sahal petharava . Himba noi inne hlana , wo heva os hemba wohdalpiana yunalm . Kava no inne , ten holvopena senamini . Himba nomba nevrava hona innemba , si wohavra yunalm .
43006059	Yesusva ishunvna manam manam honamba , di hev ten numhowol vevnam sembayangduvra Kapaniam kembella .
43006060	Wo hevtindiva nomba Yesusnamba hillinamba honamba , monglava himba os uvna , hona moamba owai , mindnam kin vev . An hevpa eva hellevav ata ?
43006061	Wo Yesusva lihawol vena , ona , himba moamba ishuv hona kana moara . Wo hev unna , es hevpa hona moamba yenamba undmba indkokla vewol vinima ?
43006062	Wo eva indkokla vewol vevavma yemba , nonglalmba , nomba arana ombolva hengava gavrava , domba temba hevpa nominiva pronamba ?
43006063	Nihva indhanamba daswolvmoa undva , nonamba almba . Owai , Sesoasongol hev daswolv undva , nonamba almba .
43006064	Wo heva os yimba monglava keknamba avmoa . Yesusva lihawol vevna , osva ovna , himba honamba undnahonamba keknamba lohvmoa . Himba os lihawol vena , nemel mendah ten hev saivnam . Wo hev vena , doara nonglana , osva ona , hehoni si kamba indkoklava vrevav sewonamba .
43006065	Yesus unna , yimba monglava keknamba avmoa , noindata osva kava ov , aramba indhanarinimba kamba wolaihamnamba owai venavrava , wo eva owaita , himba nomba provramoa kaindamba .
43006066	Yesusva honamba moamba ishopianamba , mindnamba hevtindiva os dasva buona hemba . Os wohnombolvhueina , hengava hemba engvalvohmana vevnamoa .
43006067	Yesus osihinna no 12pelaram monglam hevtindim , wo es hevpa eva yimba angawulalm vevmata ?
43006068	Simon Pita omnana Yesusm , mendekli , henahalm ata kava angavav ? Yimba wulluhv moamba , noi ten daswolvm und besal , nonam yunalm alm .
43006069	Kava yemba keknam undnahonam lovahmanav . Kava nonora , osva yimba nomba temba Sesoava onamba , wolaihapralmba .
43006070	Wo Yesus ophona , lehra yimba ov , kava doa yemba 12pelara kikih vewol vena . Heva os mongova yeriniva Setanmsna lohv .
43006071	Yesusva onngamnavna Yutasm , Simon Iskariotna ombolm . Yutasva noi , mongo 12pelarini Yesustindirini lohvna . Heva os sewonamba himba si Yesusmba ungundna englara bumb vinvav , ungundtatalm vendalm .
43007001	Wo sismba nonamba Yesusva di lohmana vevna Galili provinsrangas . Himba galmba vevnamoa Yutia provinsramba , manara , Yutanindna kuwulva doa hemba muembnavho vrinamba , helvakomandhalm .
43007002	Wo nonamba doa Yutanindnamba tihva mendekliva kuksaduvriniva mumra vinvna .
43007003	Wo hevna towandaslal umnina , yeoa honaminioa verava , gao Yerusalemram tihram . Wo yetindiva di nunglivav , mendekliandrava yimba vevrava .
43007004	Manara , himba nomba museramba loholmba vevpa , osmba annind annind kamoa nonora amnavra , wo komavramoa , nomba hevpa temba manimani vevpa . Yimba honamba manam manam memba vevpa , pevm musera eva hulvundthueinuta annindm annindm .
43007005	Himba noinda osva ishumnivna , owaita , hevna towandaslalva hemba lovahthamnavnamoa keknamba undnahonamba .
43007006	Wo Yesus unna hevna towandaslalmba , kanamba mendah prov . Heva os yimba angalmba vetava , ambo yepev ora men honanam .
43007007	Manara , annind annind pethanindva si yemba daosva wulambinvramoa . Wo heva os kam vinivra , manara , kava ishunvpa nom manam sahoklalm , hev ten vivm .
43007008	Wou , doa yeoa angavm no tih mendekliramoa . Ata kava domba provavmoa . Nambainonoava mendah kanamba provmoa .
43007009	Himba honamba hemba osva ishopieinnamba , himba hevho dawonam di wohana Galilira .
43007010	Wo towandaslalva doa os gapiana no tih mendekliramba . Wo venamba , ona , doa wohgapiana , wo eva Yesusva ambo ketkoat hemba os petheinna sis . Wo heva os himba os vevna , diva ata indhanarini kam homeis lihavm mongo .
43007011	Wo no tihrava Yutanindna kuwulva hemba di etapewulungu vevna , uvna , dihi es vei ? Hev una , hi no indhanariniva av ?
43007012	Wo indhanamba diva avnamba , owai , ambo missra holvodesvhoavna . Wo himba hevm eishovna . Monglava uvna , himba indhanarini besal lohv . Mongla uvna , owai , himba moam kokomana vinvpa indhanam .
43007013	Wo heva os owai , an eva andralva ata bambanamba muserava osva ota ? Manara , himba pem vinvna Yutanindna kuwulnapenam .
43007014	Wo tihva doa hovrahovra vrivna . Wo Yesusva sihanamba tempelmera , wo osoa ambo numhowol wohvevna .
43007015	Wo Yutanindna kuwulva di evekingil vruwul vevna , hev una , hona indhanariniva owai , numha vrinamoa , osva memba pimba , wo es hevpa himba nonorangasva lohv ?
43007016	Wo Yesus unna , manam manam memba kava yemba numhowol vevpa , owai kavnamba , kanamba moamba prov , henona ten henoi kam hom wolaihapranam .
43007017	Himba nomba mongova undva vretava , Sesoana moamba keknamba engalmba , wo himba osva levrapivongovav moana plalmba , honamba memba kava ishovpa , prov Sesoanamini . Wo himba si nonora lohvra honamba moamba , osva memba kanamba owai .
43007018	Himba nomba numhowol vevrava hevna nengavnangnamba , himba ambo hevm osm temba vevra , kakowa lehra lohv . Wo heva os himba nomba venavrava , okolalmba hemba nomba , himba temba hemba wolaihapranamba , no indhanariniva ishov tanamolnam . Heindava mana vemava dasalmba lohvmoa .
43007019	Mosesva doa lohohmomba yemba vrahunna , wo heva os yeriniva mongova nomba engvmoa lohohmomba . Wo manara yimba kamba helvakomandhalmba viv ?
43007020	Wo indhana noi di avna , hev umnina louwolm , tihsongokokla yeindava nihrava sihaiva , noinda yimba memba osva daimora ishov . Kava helvakomandhalmba vivmoa yemba .
43007021	Wo Yesus unna , kava vena mongal mendekliandrava vah iaevul okombanamba , wo yimba indkumbiva evekingil avramana vena .
43007022	Heva os yimba pevpa eva andrava vivta vah iaevul okombanamba . Manara , Mosesva doa yemba lohohmomba vrahunna , hutovmomba koalmba . Wo heva os honamba Mosesnamba owai . Hutovpa koalmba , pina pivna simbehumunna wevsa . Wo yimba noinda pevna otovotalnamba koalvuhinv vah iaevul okombanamba .
43007023	Temba yimba osm vivna , otolnamba hutovpa kueinilmba vah iaevul okombanamba , wohengalm Mosesna lohohmom . Wo manara yimba eva kamba wusapramana venavna , kava nonamba vah iaevul okombanamba wohsishona vrevnamba mongomba indhanarinimba ?
43007024	Manam yimba pevna novnamba nisva kana andramba lesvhueivav , yeoa pepthanam viuta , manam yimba seposamba vivav .
43007025	Monglava indhanamba , nomba diva temba avnamba Yerusalemrava , hev una , hona indhanarinimta , dihi mundilva helvakomandhalmba vivnata ?
43007026	Wo heva os himba numhowol vev men , wo indkumbiva vev , nungliv novna , eva hillivm aongna . Wo noinda osva an eva hemba ovomnavav , owai . Osm dihi mundilva os ningvna , himba tanam Kristus ?
43007027	Heva os kava nonora lovahv , nomini hona indhanariniva . Wo nonamba Kristusnonoava si provavpa , mongova indhanariniva si osva olhavavmoa , hinimini himba .
43007028	Yesusva mendah di numhowol vevna tempelmera . Hev mindnam vevandnam unnam , tanamta , yimba kamba nonora amnav , wo eva yimba nonora av , osva henamini kava prona . Wo heva os kava kavna nengavnangna pronamoa . Kava prona nona , henoi ten kam wolaihapranam , wo himba moanonoa ishov . Heva os yimba levrapivolvmoa hemba .
43007029	Heva os kava kavpa lihav hemba , noinda kava henamini , wo he kamba wolaihaprana .
43007030	Henanam honamba moamba Yesusva ona wulihana , diva indhanamba nomba avnamba , himba kevralm vivna hemba . Wo heva os owai , an eva ata englava piata . Manara , noinda henamba nambaiva murava provnamoa , kevralmba .
43007031	Wo heva os monglava hemba keknam undnahonam lovahthamnavna . Hev una , nonamba Kristusva si provavpa , si himba mindnam mendekliandrava vevavma , os men hona indhanarini vevnam ?
43007032	Varisinindva hilwilvna , ona , indhanamba os eishomnav Yesusmba , noindava manimani himba temba vevnamba . Wo doa vena , sembayang andranindna kuwul eva Varisinind , himba wolanga vivna tempelduvna polisimba , kevralm Yesusmba .
43007033	Wo Yesus unna , kava si yemba ambo wonasambaihavav , kava si henga gavav araindam .
43007034	Yimba si kamba aslaluwuvav , wo heva os yimba si kamba nunglivavmoa . Wo yimba ambvramoa domba , diva kava avrava .
43007035	Wo Yutanindva hevmba os eishungu vevna , henahalm hevpa galm ov , wo noinda pivva si hemba asahlihavav ? Si himba gavmi Griknindna kotaram , dom ten pivna owal eungu vinvm di ? Si himba numhowolalm gavmi Griknindm dom ?
43007036	Wo hev oi , pivva si aslalvra , wo heva os pivva si nunglivavmoa . Wo hev vei , os oi , yimba ambvramoa , diva kava avrava . Wo es hevpa memba osva oi ?
43007037	Muhuvhoavna nomba tih mendekliva doa eunillam . Doa Yesusva phonamba , hev mindnam vevandnam unna , yemba mongova snallava pehava venatava , heoa nooa prora kaindam .
43007038	Indhanariniva kamba keknamba undnahonamba lohmanatava , pomba nonapopolva avpa , si ongovra hena undrini . Os novol velohv tombaimorava .
43007039	Yesusva ishovna Sesoasongolm . Mendah Sesoasongolva prunnamoa , manara , Yesusva mendah phonamoa hevna pusambakambara . Wo os sewonamba himba nomba undnahonamba lovahthamnavrava Yesusmba , si lundthoavra hemba Sesoasongolnana .
43007040	Indhanamba nom hillinamba , ten Yesus ishovnam . Wo mongnind opulvona , hona indhanariniva tanam nomba moashulnindrini lohv , temba Sesoava wolaihapralmba onamba .
43007041	Wo mongnind opulvona , heta Kristusva , wo henga he unam , Kristusva si provavmoa Galiliriniva .
43007042	Doaramini tombaimorava os novol velohv , Kristusva si provav Devittindirini . Wo doaramini tombaimoa vena , os ona , Kristusva si provav Betlehemrini , no kembellini , ten Devit anam .
43007043	Wo doa nomba indhanamba nengavnangva vruwul vevna , epowalwolalm evevna Yesusindam .
43007044	Monglava himba kevralm vivna Yesusmba , wo heva os an eva ata hemba englava piata , kevralmba ?
43007045	Wo no tempelduvna polisiva henga anganamba , di nongalpulvoa sembayang andranindna kuwulm eva Varisinindm . Wo no kuwul osihinna , manara yimba Yesusmba waiambmba owai viv ?
43007046	Wo no tempelduvna polisi unna , himba ishovnamba manam manam mendeklinonoa , sna moamba an eva ishov ?
